cast.overview: Happy young married couple Paige and Leo are, well, happy. Then a car accident puts Paige into a life-threatening coma. Upon awakening she has lost the previous five years of memories, including those of her beloved Leo, her wedding, a confusing relationship with her parents, or the ending of her relationship with her ex-fiance. Despite these complications, Leo endeavors to win her heart again and rebuild their marriage.
cast.title: The Vow

cast.overview: Two mismatched entrepreneurs – egghead innovator Mike Lazaridis and cut-throat businessman Jim Balsillie – joined forces in an endeavour that was to become a worldwide hit in little more than a decade. The story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone.
cast.title: BlackBerry

details.biography: Dillon Casey (born October 29th, 1983) is a Canadian-American actor and producer. He is best known for his role as Sean Pierce in the CW television series Nikita (2010).
details.name: Dillon Casey
